resources.string: You will be asked 10 questions about the signs and symptoms of alzheimer\'s disease. \nAnswer each question to the best of your knowledge. \nYour responses will be scored at the end.

DISCLAIMER \nThis app was created to raise awareness and direct those that believe they or their loved one may be suffering from the early stages of alzheimer\'s disease to more information from the Alzheimer\'s Association. This quiz does not diagnose or treat any illness and is not endorsed by any medical professional or the Alzheimer\'s Association. Materials from alz.org are used with permission by the Alzheimer's Association.
Do you or your love one experience any of these examples of memory loss that disrupt daily life? Choose all that apply:
Asks for the same information over and over.
Increased need to rely on memory aids or family members for things once handled by self.
Scroll down to reveal first question.
